text: Nobody's Fools is a 1976 rock album by English band Slade. It was the band's sixth studio album. A year before, the band had moved to America to try and gain success in the country, causing the band to lose popularity in the UK and Europe. The album showed the band's declining popularity by peaking at #14 in the UK. The album featured the singles "In For A Penny", "Let's Call It Quits" and "Nobody's Fool". ==Track listing== == Other webcites == * Nobody's Fools on Discogs Category:1976 albums Category:Slade albums Category:Rock albums
title: Nobody's Fools
